typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_source_system as string,
		description as string,
		active as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select *\nfrom dwh_prepare.pre_dim_source_system',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_source_system.parquet']) ~> PreDimSourceSystem
RemoveUnusedColumns derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Source Systems') ~> DeriveTopLevel
PreDimSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		pk_source_system,
		description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
DeriveTopLevel select(mapColumn(
		sou_key = pk_source_system,
		sou_description = description,
		top_key,
		top_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
SelectOutputColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_key as string,
		sou_id as long,
		sou_description as string,
		top_description as string,
		top_id as long,
		sou_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['sou_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		top_key,
		sou_description,
		top_description,
		sou_key
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSourceSystem
